verses.verse: <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> to me, <S%H1980>Go<s%> and <S%H7069>get<s%> you a <S%H6593>linen<s%> <S%H232>girdle,<s%> and <S%H7760>put<s%> it on your <S%H4975>loins,<s%> and <S%H7760>put<s%> it not in <S%H4325>water.<s%>
So I <S%H7069>got<s%> a <S%H232>girdle<s%> according to the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H7760>put<s%> it <S%H5921>on<s%> my <S%H4975>loins.<s%>
And the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> to me the <S%H8145>second<s%> time, <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H3947>Take<s%> the <S%H232>girdle<s%> that you have <S%H7069>got,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is on your <S%H4975>loins,<s%> and <S%H6965>arise,<s%> <S%H3212>go<s%> to <S%H6578>Euphrates,<s%> and <S%H2934>hide<s%> it <S%H8033>there<s%> in a <S%H5357>hole<s%> of the <S%H5553>rock.<s%>
So I <S%H3212>went,<s%> and <S%H2934>hid<s%> it by <S%H6578>Euphrates,<s%> as the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> me.

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> to pass <S%H7093>after<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%> that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to me, <S%H6965>Arise,<s%> <S%H3212>go<s%> to <S%H6578>Euphrates,<s%> and <S%H3947>take<s%> the <S%H232>girdle<s%> from <S%H8033>there,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H6680>commanded<s%> you to <S%H2934>hide<s%> <S%H8033>there.<s%>

Then I <S%H3212>went<s%> to <S%H6578>Euphrates,<s%> and <S%H2658>dig,<s%> and <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H232>girdle<s%> from the <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> I had <S%H2934>hid<s%> it: and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> the <S%H232>girdle<s%> was <S%H7843>marred,<s%> it was <S%H6743>profitable<s%> for <S%H3808>nothing.<s%> <S%H3605><s%>
Then the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> to me, <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H3602>After<s%> this <S%H3541>manner<s%> will I <S%H7843>mar<s%> the <S%H1347>pride<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and the <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H1347>pride<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>

<S%H2088>This<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H5971>people,<s%> which <S%H3987>refuse<s%> to <S%H8085>hear<s%> my <S%H1697>words,<s%> which <S%H1980>walk<s%> in the <S%H8307>imagination<s%> of their <S%H3820>heart,<s%> and <S%H1980>walk<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods,<s%> to <S%H5647>serve<s%> them, and to <S%H7812>worship<s%> them, shall even be as <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H232>girdle,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is <S%H6743>good<s%> for <S%H3808>nothing.<s%> <S%H3605><s%>

For as the <S%H232>girdle<s%> <S%H1692>sticks<s%> to the <S%H4975>loins<s%> of a <S%H376>man,<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> have I caused to <S%H1692>stick<s%> to me the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> and the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> that they might be to me for a <S%H5971>people,<s%> and for a <S%H8034>name,<s%> and for a <S%H8416>praise,<s%> and for a <S%H8597>glory:<s%> but they would not <S%H8085>hear.<s%>

Therefore you shall <S%H559>speak<s%> to them <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1697>word;<s%> <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H3605>Every<s%> <S%H5035>bottle<s%> shall be <S%H4390>filled<s%> with <S%H3196>wine:<s%> and they shall <S%H559>say<s%> to you, Do we not certainly <S%H3045>know<s%> that <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H5035>bottle<s%> shall be <S%H4390>filled<s%> with <S%H3196>wine?<s%>

Then shall you <S%H559>say<s%> to them, <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H2005>Behold,<s%> I will <S%H4390>fill<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of this <S%H776>land,<s%> even the <S%H4428>kings<s%> that <S%H3427>sit<s%> on <S%H1732>David's<s%> <S%H3678>throne,<s%> and the <S%H3548>priests,<s%> and the <S%H5030>prophets,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> with <S%H7943>drunkenness.<s%>

And I will <S%H5310>dash<s%> them <S%H376>one<s%> <S%H413>against<s%> <S%H251>another,<s%> even the <S%H1>fathers<s%> and the <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H3162>together,<s%> <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> I will not <S%H2550>pity,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H2347>spare,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> have <S%H7355>mercy,<s%> but <S%H7843>destroy<s%> them.
<S%H8085>Hear<s%> you, and give <S%H238>ear;<s%> be not <S%H1341>proud:<s%> for the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> has <S%H1696>spoken.<s%>

<S%H5414>Give<s%> <S%H3519>glory<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H2962>before<s%> he cause <S%H2821>darkness,<s%> and <S%H2962>before<s%> your <S%H7272>feet<s%> <S%H5062>stumble<s%> on the <S%H5399>dark<s%> <S%H2022>mountains,<s%> and, while you <S%H6960>look<s%> for <S%H216>light,<s%> he <S%H7760>turn<s%> it into the <S%H6757>shadow<s%> of <S%H6757>death,<s%> and <S%H7896>make<s%> it <S%H6205>gross<s%> <S%H6205>darkness.<s%>

But <S%H518>if<s%> you will not <S%H8085>hear<s%> it, my <S%H5315>soul<s%> shall <S%H1058>weep<s%> in <S%H4565>secret<s%> places for your <S%H1466>pride;<s%> and my <S%H5869>eye<s%> shall <S%H1830>weep<s%> sore, and <S%H3381>run<s%> down with <S%H1832>tears,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD's<s%> <S%H5739>flock<s%> is <S%H7617>carried<s%> away <S%H7617>captive.<s%>

<S%H559>Say<s%> to the <S%H4428>king<s%> and to the <S%H1377>queen,<s%> <S%H8213>Humble<s%> yourselves, <S%H3427>sit<s%> down: for your <S%H4761>principalities<s%> shall <S%H3381>come<s%> <S%H3381>down,<s%> even the <S%H5850>crown<s%> of your <S%H8597>glory.<s%>

The <S%H5892>cities<s%> of the <S%H5045>south<s%> shall be <S%H5462>shut<s%> up, and <S%H369>none<s%> shall <S%H6605>open<s%> them: <S%H3063>Judah<s%> shall be <S%H1540>carried<s%> away <S%H1540>captive<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> of it, it shall be <S%H7965>wholly<s%> <S%H1540>carried<s%> away <S%H1540>captive.<s%>

<S%H5375>Lift<s%> up your <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> and <S%H7200>behold<s%> them that <S%H935>come<s%> from the <S%H6828>north:<s%> <S%H346>where<s%> is the <S%H5739>flock<s%> that was <S%H5414>given<s%> you, your <S%H8597>beautiful<s%> <S%H6629>flock?<s%>

<S%H4100>What<s%> will you <S%H559>say<s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> he shall <S%H6485>punish<s%> you? for you have <S%H3925>taught<s%> them to be <S%H441>captains,<s%> and as <S%H7218>chief<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> you: shall not <S%H2256>sorrows<s%> <S%H270>take<s%> you, as a <S%H802>woman<s%> in <S%H3205>travail?<s%>

And <S%H3588>if<s%> you <S%H559>say<s%> in your <S%H3824>heart,<s%> <S%H4069>Why<s%> <S%H7122>come<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> things on me? For the <S%H7230>greatness<s%> of your <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> are your <S%H7757>skirts<s%> <S%H1540>discovered,<s%> and your <S%H6119>heels<s%> made <S%H2554>bore.<s%>

Can the <S%H3569>Ethiopian<s%> <S%H2015>change<s%> his <S%H5785>skin,<s%> or the <S%H5246>leopard<s%> his <S%H2272>spots?<s%> then <S%H3201>may<s%> you <S%H1571>also<s%> do <S%H3190>good,<s%> that are <S%H3928>accustomed<s%> to do <S%H7489>evil.<s%>
Therefore will I <S%H6327>scatter<s%> them as the <S%H7179>stubble<s%> that <S%H5674>passes<s%> away by the <S%H7307>wind<s%> of the <S%H4057>wilderness.<s%>

<S%H2088>This<s%> is your <S%H1486>lot,<s%> the <S%H4490>portion<s%> of your <S%H4055>measures<s%> from me, <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> <S%H834>because<s%> you have <S%H7911>forgotten<s%> me, and <S%H982>trusted<s%> in <S%H8267>falsehood.<s%>
Therefore will I <S%H2834>discover<s%> your <S%H7757>skirts<s%> on your <S%H6440>face,<s%> that your <S%H7036>shame<s%> may <S%H7200>appear.<s%>

I have <S%H7200>seen<s%> your <S%H5004>adulteries,<s%> and your <S%H4684>neighings,<s%> the <S%H2154>lewdness<s%> of your <S%H2184>prostitution,<s%> and your <S%H8251>abominations<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> the <S%H1389>hills<s%> in the <S%H7704>fields.<s%> <S%H188>Woe<s%> to you, O <S%H3389>Jerusalem!<s%> will you not be made <S%H2891>clean?<s%> when shall it <S%H5750>once<s%> be?
